sentences: This issue was first addressed by SBSTA in Plenary on Wednesday, 16 June.
Parties met in informal consultations held throughout the session to discuss draft conclusions and a draft COP-10 decision.
The consultations were facilitated by Outi Berghäll (Finland) and Marcela Main (Chile).

On Friday, 25 June, Parties adopted conclusions and agreed to forward the draft COP decision to COP-10. In the opening SBSTA Plenary, delegates heard statements from the IPCC, UN Convention to Combat Desertification, Ramsar Convention on Wetlands, UN Food and Agriculture Organization and International Strategy for Disaster Reduction.
Switzerland suggested granting the Ramsar Convention permanent observer status, while Palau said Ramsar should have full membership of the Joint Liaison Group.
Several Parties emphasized coordination among national focal points.
On Friday, 25 June, contact group Co-Chair Berghäll emphasized that additional work was necessary to enhance practical cooperation between the Rio Conventions.
enb_long_title: Twentieth Session of the Subsidiary Bodies to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
